items.name: Hummus Trio
items.description: A trio of creamy hummus flavors: traditional, roasted red pepper, and garlic.

items.description: A trio of classic hummus, roasted red pepper hummus, and spicy black bean hummus served with pita bread.

items.description: Layers of phyllo pastry filled with nuts and sweetened with honey
